ygData.subject: Re: Folded Sheet of Metal
ygData.msgSnippet: I spoke to a GM about the folded sheet metal recipe not working, it s a known bug.  He could not explain why they hadn t taken the recipe out of the book
ygData.messageBody:
I spoke to a GM about the folded sheet metal recipe not working, it's a
"known bug." He could not explain why they hadn't taken the recipe out of
the book until they could fix the "known bug." He did recommend that I
write feedback, so I did.

The rumor I heard (from a completely unreliable source, so you might as well
ignore the following statement) is that folded sheet metal will be used for
making plate.

Draethar
High Elf Enchanter
Accomplished Jeweler and Master Smith


-----Original Message-----
From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, June 21, 1999 2:46 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Folded Sheet of Metal

them.
>
>Jyzan
